# id: ListenableFuture -> public void addListener(ActionListener<V> listener, ExecutorService executor, ThreadContext threadContext)
commentText: Adds a listener to this future. If the future has not yet completed, the listener will be_notified of a response or exception in a runnable submitted to the ExecutorService provided._If the future has completed, the listener will be notified immediately without forking to_a different thread.
codeText: public void addListener(ActionListener<V> listener, ExecutorService executor, ThreadContext threadContext) {_        if (done) {_            _            notifyListener(listener, EsExecutors.newDirectExecutorService())__        } else {_            final boolean run__            _            _            synchronized (this) {_                if (done) {_                    run = true__                } else {_                    listeners.add(new Tuple<>(ContextPreservingActionListener.wrapPreservingContext(listener, threadContext), executor))__                    run = false__                }_            }__            if (run) {_                _                notifyListener(listener, EsExecutors.newDirectExecutorService())__            }_        }_    }
